title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error: cgen INDEXMAP
body:
by **mathieu.root**: 
% go version
go version go1.2.2 linux/386
% go build bug.go
# command-line-arguments
cgen [8aa93d8]
.   INDEXMAP l(8) tc(1) MAP-map[int64]bool
.   .   NAME-main.b2 u(1) a(1) l(3) x(0+0) class(PEXTERN) tc(1) used(1)
MAP-map[int32]MAP-map[int64]bool
.   .   LITERAL-1 l(8) tc(1) int32
.   .   .   LITERAL-1 l(8) tc(1) int32
./bug.go:8: internal compiler error: cgen INDEXMAP

http://play.golang.org/p/eG4eUs1-gr
